title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) in Python is a programming paradigm that organizes code into objects, combining data and methods, facilitating code reusability, and modeling real-world concepts for efficient software development.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: MySQL is an open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) widely used for storing and retrieving structured data. It provides efficient data management, SQL querying, and scalability for applications.

title: Introduction to C Programming
details: C programming is a versatile, low-level programming language. It's known for system software, embedded systems, and high-performance applications. C offers control and efficiency through manual memory management.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Algorithms are step-by-step procedures for solving problems. They are fundamental in computer science, optimizing processes, and making efficient decisions in various domains, from sorting data to artificial intelligence.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: C++ is a versatile programming language often used for Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA). Its object-oriented features make it suitable for implementing complex DSA concepts and optimizing algorithmic solutions.

title: Software Engineering
details: Software Engineering is a systematic approach to designing, developing, testing, and maintaining software systems. It encompasses best practices, methodologies, and tools to ensure quality, reliability, and efficient software production.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Problem-solving is the process of analyzing, designing, and implementing solutions to challenges. It involves critical thinking, creativity, and systematic approaches to address problems effectively and reach desired outcomes..

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Basic data structures include arrays, linked lists, stacks, and queues. They organize and store data for efficient retrieval, insertion, and deletion, forming the foundation of computer algorithms and software development.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leading cloud computing platform, offering scalable and on-demand computing resources, storage, and services over the internet. It revolutionizes IT infrastructure and enables innovation.
